practice_phrases: I'm starting to feel something.
我开始感觉一些事情。
It's starting to feel very interesting.
它开始感觉非常有趣。
I'm starting to feel as if I remember.
我开始感觉好像我记得。
You're starting to feel worse than yesterday.
你开始感觉比昨天差。
I'm starting to feel ready to have a conversation.
我开始感觉准备好进行对话。
It's starting to feel like the best choice.
它开始感觉像最好选择。
I'm starting to feel better than when we were in the pub.
我开始感觉比我们在酒吧时更好。
I'm starting to feel as if you like to use your car.
我开始感觉好像你喜欢用你的车。
It's starting to feel as if I'm ready before you leave.
它开始感觉好像在你离开前我准备好。
I'm starting to feel better than I was last time we talked to each other.
我开始感觉比我们上次互相交谈时更好。
I feel easier.
我感觉更容易了。
It's starting to feel easier.
它开始感觉更容易了。
The conversation is starting to feel easier.
对话开始感觉更容易了。
I feel easier when you remember.
我感觉更容易了当你记得。
It's starting to feel easier than yesterday.
它开始感觉比昨天更容易了。
I feel easier when I use your car.
我感觉更容易了当我用你的车。
It's starting to feel easier to have a conversation.
它开始感觉进行对话更容易了。
I feel easier when we talked to each other.
我感觉更容易了当我们互相交谈。
It's starting to feel easier than when we were in the pub.
它开始感觉比我们在酒吧时更容易了。
I feel easier when you like to go by bus.
我感觉更容易了当你喜欢坐公共汽车去。
It's easier.
它更容易。
Easier than yesterday.
比昨天更容易。
It's starting to feel easier.
它开始感觉更容易。
It's easier when you remember.
它更容易当你记得。
It's easier to have a conversation.
进行对话更容易。
It's easier than when we were in the pub.
它比我们在酒吧时更容易。
It's starting to feel easier than yesterday.
它开始感觉比昨天更容易。
It's easier when we learn something new.
它更容易当我们学习新东西。
It's easier to use your car than to go by bus.
用你的车比坐公共汽车去更容易。
It's starting to feel easier when we talked to each other.
它开始感觉更容易当我们互相交谈。
How it's going?
它的进展？
I remember how it's going.
我记得它的进展。
I like how it's going.
我喜欢它的进展。
Can I ask you how it's going?
我能问你它的进展吗？
It's starting to feel easier how it's going.
它开始感觉更容易它的进展。
I feel better than how it's going yesterday.
我感觉比它昨天的进展更好。
I wasn't expecting how it's going when we were in the pub.
我没有期待它的进展当我们在酒吧时。
I can remember how it's going when we talked to each other.
我能记得它的进展当我们互相交谈。
That was very interesting how it's going before you leave.
那非常有趣它的进展在你离开前。
I'm starting to feel easier about how it's going than yesterday.
我开始感觉更容易关于它的进展比昨天。
I'm excited about how it's going.
我对它的进展感到兴奋。
You're excited about how it's going.
你对它的进展感到兴奋。
I'm starting to feel excited about how it's going.
我开始感觉对它的进展感到兴奋。
I'm excited about how it's going today.
我对它今天的进展感到兴奋。
I'm excited about how it's going than yesterday.
我对它的进展比昨天感到兴奋。
I'm excited about how it's going when we talk.
我对它的进展感到兴奋当我们交谈。
I'm starting to feel excited about how it's going easier.
我开始感觉对它的进展更容易感到兴奋。
I'm excited about how it's going when we were in the pub.
我对它的进展感到兴奋当我们在酒吧时。
I'm excited about how it's going and I wasn't expecting it.
我对它的进展感到兴奋，我没有期待它。
I'm starting to feel easier and excited about how it's going.
我开始感觉更容易了和对它的进展感到兴奋。
I feel excited.
我感到兴奋。
I'm starting to feel excited.
我开始感到兴奋。
I feel excited when you remember.
我感到兴奋当你记得。
I feel excited about the conversation.
我对对话感到兴奋。
I feel excited about how it's going.
我对它的进展感到兴奋。
I'm starting to feel excited and easier.
我开始感到兴奋和更容易了。
I feel excited when we talked to each other.
我感到兴奋当我们互相交谈。
I'm starting to feel excited about how it's going.
我开始对它的进展感到兴奋。
I feel excited when it's starting to feel easier.
我感到兴奋当它开始感觉更容易了。
It's starting to feel easier and I'm excited about how it's going.
它开始感觉更容易了，我对它的进展感到兴奋。
